title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
description: This course is designed for beginners who need to familiarize themselves with Microsoft Teams.
It covers essential features and tools necessary for effective communication and collaboration within the platform.

sections.title: Using Chat for Instant Messaging
sections.content: How to start a chat, send messages, and use features like reactions and mentions.

sections.title: Making Voice and Video Calls
sections.content: Guidance on initiating voice calls, video calls, and conference calls within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Working with Channels
sections.content: Explanation of channels, how to create them, join existing ones, and use channel tabs for organization.

sections.title: Managing Files in Microsoft Teams
sections.content: Instructions on uploading files, sharing documents, and using the file explorer.

sections.title: Connecting with Outlook
sections.content: How to integrate your Outlook calendar and email within Microsoft Teams for seamless communication.

sections.title: Using SharePoint in Teams
sections.content: Details on how to use SharePoint sites directly from the Teams interface.
